articles.title: Kim Jong Un Offers Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Offers Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Kophung, April 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Ri Yu Sun, a centenarian woman residing in the township of Kophung County, Jagang Province.
					 Born into a farm servant family in the period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, Ri experienced the suffering as a member of the ruined nation, being subject to maltreatment and contempt.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthy life. During the Fatherland Liberation War she took an active part in assisting to soldiers in the front. She had devoted herself to agricultural production even after becoming a pensioner.
					
					 She likes potato foods, in particular, and has balanced diet. Even now she leads an optimistic life with needlework and gardening.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Swedish PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Swedish PM
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Saturday sent a message of sympathy to Stefan Lofven, prime minister of Sweden, as regards the terrorist attack in Stockholm that caused casualties. 
					 In the message Pak said the Korean people share the grief at the loss with the Swedish people, reaffirming the consistent stand of the DPRK government of opposing all forms of terrorism.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of sympathy to his Swedish counterpart Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom on the same day.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Leader
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a reply message from Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on March 24.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express heartfelt thanks, on behalf of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party and myself, to you for the warm congratulations, wishes and a beautiful floral basket you sent on the 62nd founding anniversary of the LPRP.
					
					 I believe that the DPRK will continue to achieve bigger fresh successes in implementing the cause of building a socialist power under the energetic leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by you.
					
					 I wish you good health and successes in your noble work.
					
					 I hope that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, governments and peoples of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will grow stronger.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here Saturday to celebrate the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Among those present were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials and the chairman of the C.C., Korean Social Democratic Party.
					
					 Vice Marshal of Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman marked a historic event of epochal significance in the struggle for carving out the destiny of the people and achieving the prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il brought about a new turn in building a powerful socialist country under the uplifted banner of Songun in the period of steering overall state affairs, shouldering upon himself the heavy responsibility as NDC chairman, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 Under the complicated international political situation, Kim Jong Il firmly adhered to the independent stand and led the DPRK to consistently embody the principle of independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 He fully equipped the army and people with the revolutionary idea of the party and consolidated the single-minded unity of the leader, the party, the army and the people as firm as a rock, thus building political forces so that the DPRK could maintain a strong independent stand in its activities.
					
					 He regarded it as a firm principle to accelerate the building of a powerful socialist country by dint of self-reliance and self-development and made sure that all issues arising in the revolution and construction were solved by our own efforts and with indigenous technology and locally available resources.
					
					 He reliably defended the socialist cause with the original Songun politics and turned the DPRK into an invincible military power and nuclear weapons state which no formidable enemy dare attack.
					
					 He glorified the DPRK as a socialist state centered on the popular masses, the state governed by the Juche-oriented viewpoint on the people and people's philosophy.
					
					 Under his leadership, there came the June 15 era of reunification in which the Koreans were making a dynamic advance, guided by the idea of By our nation itself and the DPRK's international prestige and influence rapidly rose.
					
					 His ardent and patriotic desire for a powerful country is being translated into reality under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The present era going by the august name of Kim Jong Un will be glorified as the era of great succession in which Kim Jong Il's patriotic desire for a powerful country is coming true in all aspects and the great era of prosperity in which the DPRK steadily prospers and its people's dream and ideal are coming true, the reporter stressed.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Women's Union Members
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Women's Union Members
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of women's union officials and members took place in the plaza of the Arch of Triumph here on Sunday to celebrate the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The dancing party began with the playing of song "Glory to General". 
					
					 Its participants danced to the tune of songs like "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" and "Ongheya for Victory of Songun" with the feelings of gratitude to Kim Jong Il who opened up the future of a prosperous country with his distinguished idea, leadership and ardent patriotic devotion.
					
					 Joyfully dancing to the tune of song "Our Leader Loved by People", they paid the highest glory to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is translating Kim Jong Il's desire for a powerful country into reality and demonstrating the dignity and strength of the DPRK.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youths and Students in DPRK
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youths and Students in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Sunday to celebrate the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Dancing parties in the capital city of Pyongyang were staged at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and other places.
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of such songs as "Confetti of Wishes" and "Song of Youth" and other songs, recalling the exploits of Kim Jong Il who reliably defended the dignity and supreme interests of the country and the nation and developed Juche Korea into an invincible socialist power, always finding himself in the forefront of the revolution under the banner of Songun.
					
					 They were full of conviction that his patriotic desire for a powerful country would surely come true under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also held in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: International Marathon Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
International Marathon Marks Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon took place here on Sunday with due ceremony at Kim Il Sung Stadium to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Players from the DPRK, Rwanda, Morocco, Kenya, Ethiopia and Ukraine competed in marathon, half marathon and 10km race.
					
					 At least 1 100 marathon amateurs from over 50 countries and regions including the Netherlands, Germany, the U.S., China, Canada, France, the UK, Australia, Japan and Taipei of China also took part in the contest.
					
					 Among those present at the ceremony was officials concerned, sportspersons, Pyongyangites and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, in his opening speech hoped that all players and amateurs would register high records in the contest.
					
					 Then the marathon took place.
					
					 The following are the results of the marathon:
					
					1. Pak Chol (DPRK male player) and Jo Un Ok (DPRK female player)
					
					2. Sbaai Youssef (male player of Morocco) and Ayantu Dakebo Hailemaryam (female player of Ethiopia)
					
					3. Ri Pok Ryol (male player of DPRK) and Kim Hye Gyong (female player of DPRK)
					
					 The results of the half marathon:
					
					1. Ales Debeljak (male player of Slovenia) and female player of Hong Kong, China 
					
					2. Dover Thomas Anthony David (male player of Australia and Jeanette (female player of Singapore) 
					
					3. Tomasz Luczynski (male player of Poland) and Puchala Ewelina Marta (female player of Poland)
					
					There took place the closing ceremony at the end of the marathon.

articles.title: Group B Matches of AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers (4)
articles.content:
Group B Matches of AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers (4)
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Following are the results from Group B matches of the AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers held at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on Sunday.

					 South Korea : Hong Kong of China 6:0

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates an editorial to the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Kim Jong Il is a prominent leader and an ardent patriot who reliably protected the destiny of the country and the nation and advanced the cause of building a socialist power to victory with his unique idea and energetic Songun leadership, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean People's Army grew to be an army strong in idea and faith and the crack ranks of combatants and the DPRK turned into a satellite manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear power. And a vigorous industrial revolution in the new century was launched in the country.
					
					 His idea and feats for the building of a socialist power serve as a basic guarantee and motive force that make it possible for the DPRK to display its might as an invincible politico-military giant and dash toward the high eminence of prosperity along the orbit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 They constitute the main source of the strength of the country and its people who are making uninterrupted innovations and progress and successive offensive, creating new spirit and speed of the era, and the eternal treasure for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 The idea and cause of Kim Jong Il are science and victory.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the party and the revolution and glorify his noble revolutionary career and exploits, dedicated to the country and its people, for all ages.

articles.title: People's Absolute Trust in WPK Serves as Invincible Might of Socialist Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
People's Absolute Trust in WPK Serves as Invincible Might of Socialist Korea: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- It has been five years since respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un declared the general advance in the new century of Juche with his ardent appeal "Forward towards final victory!" at the tribune of honor of the military parade marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 Noting the past five years are shining as the greatest heyday of the Juche revolution and a period of new prosperity in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea during which the DPRK worked miraculous victories and made leaps forward in all fields despite the U.S. and its vassal forces' worst-ever political, economic and military pressure and blockade, the article goes on:
					
					 Today the Korean army and people's trust in their leader has reached its height and the harmonious whole of the Party and the masses has been consolidated as firm as rock, which is something unprecedented. This is just a general review of the past five years when the new century of Juche was opened up and the greatest exploits of the WPK.
					
					 All servicepersons and civilians are filled with a will to trust and remain loyal to the Party to the end. This firmly guarantees the victorious advance of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 As the army and people's trust in the Party grows deeper, the vitality and strength of the Party become inexhaustible and the gigantic advance of the Korean revolution will win a victory after another by dint of the single-minded unity.
					
					 Their deepest trust in the Party is a brilliant fruition of the popular masses-first policy pursued by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their absolute trust in the great Party serves as tremendous power of bringing about all miracles and victories in socialist Korea and the source of working miracles in the building of a socialist power in the era of Mallima.
					
					 As the Party remains true to the people's trust and the service personnel and people remain loyal to the intention of the Party, the great advance of the Juche revolution will be given steady continuity until the day when the great cause pioneered on Mt Paektu is accomplished.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea Denounced for Biochemical War Moves
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Denounced for Biochemical War Moves
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Pusan People for Achieving Peace and Reunification made public a commentary in denunciation of the U.S. forces in south Korea for biochemical war moves on April 5, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 The U.S. deployed some parts of the biochemical weapons system in the U.S. military base in Pusan as part of the Jupiter Plan, the commentary noted.
					
					 It urged the south Korean Defense Ministry to stop playing the role of an accomplice in threatening life and safety of the people as evidenced by the allowance, help and cooperation in the illegal introduction of the biochemical weapons of the U.S. forces. 
					
					 It also demanded that the Pusan City authorities take active measures concerning the U.S. military bases and facilities in Pusan and urge the U.S. forces to open to public the plan for a biochemical war.

articles.title: S. Koreans File Suit against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Koreans File Suit against THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- 2,550 south Korean people including residents in Songju County and Kimchon City of North Kyongsang Province filed a suit with the puppet Constitutional Court against the THAAD deployment moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment and other organizations held a press conference outside the "Constitutional Court" on April 6 to file the suit.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Demand Withdrawal of THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Demand Withdrawal of THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and other organizations of south Korea reportedly called a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on April 6, urging the withdrawal of THAAD deployment and the decision of the U.S. government. 
					 Speakers at the conference said that THAAD brings nothing good to south Korea but arms race, war and disaster to the world. 
					
					 If the U.S. persists in THAAD deployment in violation of the people's sovereignty, the candlelight action which ousted dictator Park Geun Hye will be directed to the U.S., they stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Air Force Introduces New Transport Aircraft
articles.content:
S. Korean Air Force Introduces New Transport Aircraft
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers deployed new transport aircraft in the Air Force for secret infiltration of special unit into the north, according a report of the south Korean internet paper E-daily on March 30.
					 They are remodeling four C-130H transport planes for "beheading operation" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Regional Body
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria on Apr. 3 posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem as Eternal President of Our Republic".
					 The work, published on July 11 and 19, Juche 83 (1994), sets forth the tasks for holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages and defending and carrying forward his idea and undying exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised as Sun of 21st Century in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised as Sun of 21st Century in Switzerland
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 3 in support of the DPRK government's memorandum.
					 Noting that the DPRK government released a memorandum on the immortal exploits of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the statement said:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un beefed up the nuclear force of the DPRK, thus breaking the world political structure centered on the existing nuclear powers and fundamentally changing the world political landscape.
					
					 He made the DPRK demonstrate its dignity as the most powerful country which no one can dare to provoke.
					
					 He also laid a firm guarantee for frustrating the U.S. imperialists' wild ambition to annex the DPRK and reduce all Koreans to slaves.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership, the DPRK is dynamically speeding up the building of a socialist economic power and a highly civilized nation and its people's standard of living is improving day by day.
					
					 The shining successes being made in the DPRK clearly prove that Kim Jong Un is the guardian of independence and justice and a great man.
					
					 The Korean army and people will further consolidate their treasured nuclear sword for self-defence and dash toward the high eminence of prosperity at the world-startling Korean speed under his guidance.
					
					 We praise respected Supreme Leader Marshal Kim Jong Un as the sun of the 21st century.
